content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Please tell me how much you are looking for, Mister Heine.

I am looking for x Euros per month.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Nesibe. I am looking for a rental price that is fair and commensurate with the value of the apartment. May I know what your proposed rental price is?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My proposed rental price is 1200 Euros per month.

I agree to the price of 1200 Euros per month.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your proposal, Nesibe. I am pleased to agree to a rental price of 1200 Euros per month for my apartment. I look forward to having you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
